container.name: [eng].[IPLM_PROBLEM_REPORT_TBL]
container.query: SELECT NAME as parent_filename, 'https://lambots.lamrc.net/lambots/enterprise-lambot' as parent_url, STATE as STATE, PRIORITY as PRIORITY, CONCAT('PR NUMBER: ', NAME, '; PROBLEM: ', PROBLEM_DESCRIPTION, '; REASON: ', REASON, '; SUGGESTED_SOLUTION: ', SUGGESTED_SOLUTION) as chunk, NAME as chunk_id FROM eng.IPLM_PROBLEM_REPORT_TBL;
